snippet: The emotional turmoil of six silent characters is revealed, in slow motion, in “Last Touch First,” by Jiri Kylian and Michael Schumacher, at the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews New York premiere of Last Touch First by choreographers Jiri Kylian and Michael Schumacher at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: The emotional turmoil of six silent characters is revealed, in slow motion, in “Last Touch First,” by Jiri Kylian and Michael Schumacher, at the Joyce Theater.

headline.seo: ‘Last Touch First’ at the Joyce Theater
headline.main: Domestic Warfare, Seen in Slow Motion
headline.print_headline: Domestic Warfare, Seen in Slow Motion
